primitiveValues.textValue: Have you uploaded your wire receipt? Mobile Wire AUT

ConversationMessageDefinition.label: Have you uploaded your wire receipt? Mobile Wire AUT

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
1. Tap the NDAX SYMBOL located at the top left-hand corner of the page
  2. Select WALLET from the pulldown menu
  3. Select CANADIAN DOLLAR or United States Dollar from the list of assets
  4. Tap the green down arrow to deposit
  5. Select WIRE TRANSFER
  6. Copy the information provided and initiate a wire transfer from your online banking platform's website or in the branch with the information provided
  7. Once you send the wire transfer from your financial institution, click UPLOAD A RECEIPT located at the bottom of the page
  8. Enter your FULL NAME and AMOUNT as shown on the wire receipt
  9. Upload a copy of the wire transfer receipt by tapping on "Click here to select a file"
  10. Tap on SUBMIT once finished
  11. Typically, it takes 0â€“1 business day for a wire transfer to land from your bank and into your NDAX CAD wallet.
